type.name: org.gradle.api.file.SourceDirectorySet
type.description:
A SourceDirectorySet represents a set of source files composed from a set of source directories, along with associated include and exclude patterns.

TODO - configure includes/excludes for individual source dirs, and sync up with CopySpec TODO - allow add FileTree

method.name: getFilter
method.description:
Returns the filter used to select the source from the source directories. These filter patterns are applied after the include and exclude patterns of the source directory set itself. Generally, the filter patterns are used to select certain types of files, eg *.java.

returns:The filter patterns.

method.name: srcDirs
method.description:
Adds the given source directories to this set.
param:srcPaths The source directories. These are evaluated as per org.gradle.api.Project#files(Object...)

returns:this

method.name: getSrcDirTrees
method.description:
Returns the source directory trees which make up this set. Does not filter source directories which do not exist.

returns:The source directory trees. Returns an empty set when this set contains no source directories.

method.name: source
method.description:
Adds the given source to this set.
param:source The source to add.

returns:this

method.name: srcDir
method.description:
Adds the given source directory to this set.
param:srcPath The source directory. This is evaluated as per org.gradle.api.Project#file(Object)

returns:this

method.name: getName
method.description: A concise name for the source directory set (typically used to identify it in a collection).

method.name: setSrcDirs
method.description:
Sets the source directories for this set.
param:srcPaths The source directories. These are evaluated as per org.gradle.api.Project#files(Object...)

returns:this

method.name: getSrcDirs
method.description:
Returns the source directories which make up this set. Does not filter source directories which do not exist.

returns:The source directories. Returns an empty set when this set contains no source directories.

property.name: filter
property.description:
Returns the filter used to select the source from the source directories. These filter patterns are applied after the include and exclude patterns of the source directory set itself. Generally, the filter patterns are used to select certain types of files, eg *.java.

returns:The filter patterns.

property.name: name
property.description: A concise name for the source directory set (typically used to identify it in a collection).

property.name: srcDirTrees
property.description:
Returns the source directory trees which make up this set. Does not filter source directories which do not exist.

returns:The source directory trees. Returns an empty set when this set contains no source directories.

property.name: srcDirs
property.description:
Returns the source directories which make up this set. Does not filter source directories which do not exist.

returns:The source directories. Returns an empty set when this set contains no source directories.
